Package: org.codehaus.groovy.grails.compiler

[Java] Class GrailsProjectWatcher

          • org.codehaus.groovy.grails.compiler.GrailsProjectWatcher

          • Watches a Grails project and re-compiles sources when they change or fires events to the pluginManager.

            deprecated:
            Use GrailsProjectWatcher instead
            Authors:
            Graeme Rocher
            Since:
            2.0
